List all the movies with it's informatio:
SELECT DISTINCT ?name, ?number, ?abstract, 
      (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?starringlabel; SEPARATOR="-") AS ?starringlabel),
       ?cinematography, ?director, ?gross, 
        (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?producer; SEPARATOR="-") AS ?producer), 
        ?language
WHERE
 {
  ?film dbo:wikiPageWikiLink dbr:Romantic_comedy .
  ?film dbo:wikiPageID ?number .
  ?film dbp:starring ?starring .
  ?starring rdfs:label ?starringlabel.
  ?film rdfs:comment ?abstract .
  ?film dbp:name ?name .
  OPTIONAL { ?film dbo:cinematography ?cinematographyurl.
   ?cinematographyurl rdfs:label ?cinematography. } .
  OPTIONAL { ?film dbo:director ?directorurl.
   ?directorurl rdfs:label ?director. } .
  OPTIONAL { ?film dbo:gross ?gross } .
  OPTIONAL { ?film dbo:producer ?producerurl.
  ?producerurl rdfs:label ?producer.
       FILTER (LANG(?producer) = 'en' )
    } .
  OPTIONAL { ?film dbp:language ?language } .

  FILTER ( LANG ( ?abstract ) = 'en'  && LANG(?starringlabel) = 'en' )
}
SELECT ?country
WHERE
{
  ?countryurl a yago:WikicatMiddleEasternCountries.
  ?countryurl rdfs:label ?country.
   MINUS{?countryurl rdfs:label "Israel"@en}.
  FILTER(LANG(?country) = 'en').
}
Random 10 people with the name Manel (Ne:
SELECT  distinct ?name ?birth_year
WHERE { 
  ?link a foaf:Person. 
  ?link ?p ?name. 
  FILTER(?p IN(dbo:birthName,dbp:birthName,dbp:fullname,dbp:name)). 
  ?link rdfs:label ?person_name .    
  ?person_name bif:contains "Manel" . 
  OPTIONAL { ?link dbo:birthYear ?birth_year .  }
  FILTER(langMatches(lang(?name), "en"))
} LIMIT 10
OFFSET 10
